overview.en: NFTLootBox (LOOT) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. NFTLootBox has a current supply of 40,000 with 22,599 in circulation. The last known price of NFTLootBox is 121.0540265 USD and is up 6.47 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 3 active market(s) with $1,674,857.43 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://nftlootbox.com.
